page.title: 12THE VILLAGE INSTITUTE
page.content: On school days the Institute is used exclusively by Sutton School as a classroom and a school hall. Meals are served there and the building is also used for musical events, plays religious services, assemblies and parties during school time. In the evenings various activities take place in the building. MONDAY(winter)-Farmers' Discussion TUESDAY Keep-Fit WEDNESDAY (2nd in month) W.I. THURSDAY (winter) Youth Club-7-14yrs. SUNDAY combined Church/Chapel Services The Parish Council meets monthly The building may be hired privately for such functions as wedding receptions, dances, parties etc. The cost of hiring is Â£2 per hour for villagers and Â£5 an hour for outsiders.
